text: Chalai or Chalaion was a town in Phthiotis in ancient Thessaly. The town's name is not attested directly, but s extrapolated from its demonym, . Its site has been located at a place called Tsournati, where archaeological remains from the Archaic and Classical periods have been found. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Achaea Phthiotis Category:Archaeological sites in Greece
title: Chalai (Thessaly)
